LOGOUT_OTHER_SESSION.TITLE: Logout other session
LOGOUT_OTHER_SESSION.DESCRIPTION: Select the session you want to logout from.

LOGOUT_OTHER_SESSIONS.TITLE: Logout other sessions
LOGOUT_OTHER_SESSIONS.DESCRIPTION: Logout from other devices except this one.

BILLING_ADDRESS.TITLE: Billing address
BILLING_ADDRESS.DESCRIPTION: Your billing address. Keep it up to date to avoid any issues.

BANK_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Bank account
BANK_ACCOUNT.DESCRIPTION: Your bank account. Add or remove it.

PAYMENT_METHODS.TITLE: Payment methods
PAYMENT_METHODS.DESCRIPTION: Your payment methods. Add or remove them.

IN_STREAM_NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: In-stream notifications
IN_STREAM_NOTIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Generate or regenerate your in-stream notifications token.

REGENERATED_TOKEN.TITLE: Regenerated token!
REGENERATED_TOKEN.DESCRIPTION:
Your in-stream notifications token has been regenerated. Don't forget to update it in your streaming software.
This token won't show up again, so make sure to save it somewhere safe.
